Greetings, I would like to prepare (populate) a database for unit
testing some DAO classes. After executing the unit tests, I would
like to restore the database (delete any records created during testing).

Is there an open source tool to do this.
I need something that can just read and execute SQL in a file.
Can I do this with Torque? Are there other tools that are easier to 
work with?

robert
subject: Setting up database for unit testing
